name: 秦毓權
objective: 課程重點：(1)藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2)使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3)熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4)透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
schedule:
Week	Content
1	Orientation
2	Unit 5—Green Chemistry: Reading
3	Unit 5: Reading / Listening
4	Unit 5: Writing
5	Unit 6—The Art of Marc Chagall: Reading
6	Unit 6: Reading / Listening
7	Unit 6: Speaking
8	In class Mid-term Exam
9	Midterm exam and Proficiency Test
10	Unit 7—Niche Marketing: Reading
11	Unit 7: Reading / Listening
12	Unit 7: Reading / Listening
13	Unit 7: Writing
14	Unit 8—Nonverbal Communication: Listening
15	Unit 8: Reading / Listening
16	Unit 8: Speaking
17	In class Final Exam
18	Final Exam and Proficiency Test
scorePolicy:
